entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
